name: HealthBridge Agent
description: A HIPAA-aligned agent that synthesizes Apple HealthKit data into clinical summaries for healthcare providers.

components.name: PatientVitalsDashboard
components.description: A SwiftUI-based view for patients to authorize and view HealthKit sync status.

components.name: DoctorBriefingView
components.description: A web-based interface for clinicians to view agent-generated health summaries.

components.name: VoiceSynthesisModule
components.description: Integration with ElevenLabs to provide audio handoffs for doctors.

capabilities.name: HealthKitDataIngestion
capabilities.description: Syncing heart rate, HRV, and sleep data via HKAnchoredObjectQuery.

capabilities.name: AgenticSummarization
capabilities.description: Using rtrvr to analyze 7-day trends and generate clinical insights.

capabilities.name: SecureProviderSharing
capabilities.description: Exporting data in FHIR-compliant JSON formats for doctor review.

milestones.name: HealthKit Integration
milestones.description: Establish baseline data sync from Apple Health.

milestones.name: Agent Intelligence
milestones.description: Connect rtrvr to synthesize raw data into human-readable insights.

milestones.name: Provider Portal
milestones.description: Deliver the final dashboard and voice briefing interface.
